name: Ghost Castle: Gengar's Love Quest
description:
Pokémon are divided into eighteen types, each with their own royalty and stronghold. The most mysterious type, the ghosts, gather here... What sort of relationships will you, the new visitor, form?

Ghost Castle: Gengar's Love Quest is a BL visual novel with three separate routes,  over 50 unique CGs, and a fully functioning sprite and CG gallery. Explore the castle through the eyes of Gengar, a charming ghost who is eager to learn all about the residents (especially the cute ones!). 


Explore all the routes to fully fill out the sprite and CG gallery. Whose heart will you pursue first? The butler Chandelure, the jester Banette? Maybe even the mysterious prince Giratina...?

 

Ghost Castle contains 5-10 hours of story split across the three story routes. By playing all three, you'll get a fuller picture of the castle residents... and of Gengar himself!

Content warning: This game has adult themes and strong language. It is meant for adults only.
